title: User Story: Abuse

title: User Story: Abuse
content:
```
Been walking on eggshells lately.  Everything I do is wrong.  Is this normal in a relationship?  Starting to feel really small.  Anyone else experienced this?  Don't know where to turn.
```

reason: Feeling consistently criticized and diminished within a relationship can indicate emotional abuse. The phrase 'walking on eggshells' suggests a pattern of controlling behavior.
